Title: James and the Giant Peach
Writer: Roald Dahl (based on the book by), Karey Kirkpatrick (screenplay), Jonathan Roberts (screenplay), Steve Bloom (screenplay)
Actors: Simon Callow, Richard Dreyfuss, Jane Leeves, Joanna Lumley
Plot: James' happy life at the English seaside is rudely ended when his parents are killed by a rhinoceros and he goes to live with his two horrid aunts. Daringly saving the life of a spider he comes into possession of magic boiled crocodile tongues, after which an enormous peach starts to grow in the garden. Venturing inside he meets not only the spider but a number of new friends including a ladybug and a centipede who help him with his plan to try and get to New York.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 4 wins & 12 nominations.
